bike.description: 100% CR-MO, Classic Urban Single Speed Lugged Design, Double Butted Main Frame, Tapered Rear Stays, Built-in Seat Clamp, Water Bottle & Fender Mounts, Built-In Chain Tensioners

components.description: 100% Cr-Mo, Triple Butted Legs, w/ Lugged Crown & Internally Fluted Steerer Tube
Pazzaz Alloy Double Butted Track Bar, 420mm Wide
Tektro RL-570, 2 Finger Alloy, F & R
Tektro R320 Dual Pivot Calipers, F & R
SE Super Classic w/ Bottle Opener
SE Alloy, Euro BB, 46T Alloy Chainring, BCD 144
Wellgo R025B Sealed, Machined Alloy Cage, Cr-Mo Axle, w/ Metal Toe Clip & Straps
Alex DA-13, Double Wall, 32 Hole, Stainless Spokes
SE High Flange Alloy, 32H, Sealed Bearing, Nutted, 3/8" Hollow Axle
SE High Flange Alloy Flip Flo 32H, Sealed Bearing, Nutted, 3/8" Hollow Axle, 17T Freewheel & 17T Sugino Cog
Zipper Top Tube Pad, Alloy Axle Nuts, Removable SE Brake Cable Clips, Built-In Chain Tensioners, *Red indicates updated spec from 2009
